website_summaries.verdict: A matte finish stick foundation that is easy to travel with.
pros: Medium coverage foundation with a soft matte finish and buildable coverage
Ideal for oily and combination skin
Can be applied with fingers, directly from the stick or with a blender
cons: Some buyers say it doesn't last long

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking
customer_reviews.text: I recently had an accident where I banged one side of my face onto an end table. So half of my face was terribly bruised, but as it faded somewhat I used the makeup to blend in (in fact I used 2 different shades) and people told me that they couldn't even tell. Without my makeup they sure could! The creamy smoothness and the sponge applicator made it so easy to blend and doesn't even look like I have makeup on.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Light and Flawless!
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed the way I wear makeup. I've never been one to put foundation on my face. I have been lucky to have clear skin my whole life, but as I age, my skin tones aren't even. NARS Velvet Matte Foundation Stick is light, easy to apply and evens out my skin tone. It doesn't smear or rub off on clothes and creates a great "canvas" to apply the rest of my makeup without looking heavy or cake-y. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Shuppie

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: I use/buy this product consistently and what I purchased from this store was entirely too soft to be an authentic NARS product. It was so soft that I could not apply it to my face directly, for a large chunk would come off of the stick. Even when using a sponge or beauty blender, it was extremely messy.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this. Product has about 2 weeks supply in the stick very small not worth it. Big rip off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit!!!! Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty sure this product is not authentic!!! I have bought this product before directly from Nars and it has never made my skin itch. Ever since I’ve bought this item my skin is breaking out and has started to itch.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Greasy and slides off
customer_reviews.text: It’s very oily like and the coverage does not last. Def not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lori Vastbinder

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Love the feel and the finish for special nights out!!
customer_reviews.author: TC.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, small size
customer_reviews.text: Great product just wish it came in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: De'Anna Butler

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish
customer_reviews.text: Nice finish. Wish they didnt discontinue. Always wished product itself was a little bigger so it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: PMG

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This was ENTIRELY the wrong shade and they would give me neither a refund or let me exchange it. If I could give less than one star I would.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Philange

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said it was too drying for her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Krupa

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Not at all like the first one I bought.. texture very different.. broke apart when applying and seemed to be far less product
customer_reviews.author: catherine raftery

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight acting feels like velvet, I use to buy it at sephora a few years ago everyone stop selling it idk why amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: Aleah Jeringan

customer_reviews.title: Yeah
customer_reviews.text: They quit making this and I glad I found it
customer_reviews.author: Tooth Dr

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, velvety smooth and doesn’t run.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years and very disappointed it has been discontinued. The velvety smooth feel along with the perfect match to my complexion makes this my go to lightweight foundation in the summer. The best thing about it, if you sweat, it doesn’t run!!!! Perfect to take to the beach for quick reapplication...I just don’t know why they wouldn’t keep this on the market. Great Amazon purchase experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nars Velvet Matte Foundation Stick, 05 New Guinea, 0.31 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:05 New Guinea| Size:0.31 OunceA matte foundation stick with a creamy texture that enhances your complexion and provides a soft, matte finish. It provides a medium coverage and contains a built in touch up blender on the other end, that is perfect, for touch ups on the go.
feature_bullets: A pivoting head adjusts to the contours of face
Includes a non slip rubber handle for great control and maneuverability
It offers a gentle shave for sensitive skin
